Summary: Round like UFO that moved then multiplied and speed off
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Kirkland
There were no other sightings in Kirkland on or around July 18th 1998
divs: Sighting DetailsI am 28 years old now and back when I was about 17 my friend and I one very late night decided to go out on his back deck to look for satellites passing for we were quite bored. On his back deck it overlooked the downtown Kirkland area towards Seattle. It wasn't until about 45mins later that when we were overlooking the Kirkland area that I saw what looked like a white ball moving quite fast heading north over Kirkland horizontally (while I was seeing this and keeping my eyes on the ���target��� I ask my friend if he is seeing what I am seeing and he replied yes and continued watching) and then all off a sudden it started to speed up and then it multiplied and we now saw three or more objects now heading north horizontally like six times fast than when it first started off and then soon after disappeared. Right after that happened my friend and I decided to go inside for we were freaked out about what we just saw. I am a VERY skeptical person and today I still don't believe in UFO's or anything of the sort but I still to this day can't figure out what the heck that was. I am curious about people sighting but there is a big part of me that says they are full of it and I guess I still won���t believe until something more major I guess happens to me.
